name: Don't Make Love
description: Assume the role of a praying mantis in a relationship dilemma. Torn between their mutual love and the instinct to have sex – which could lead to the male mantis’s death – the couple is on the verge of making a decision. Type anything you want in response to your partner during this life-changing conversation.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 2100 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Storage: 500 MB available space
